code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={searchText:"",pageNumber:1,pageSize:6,teamIds:""};var playersFetchSuffixSlise=createSlice({name:"playersFetchSuffix",initialState:initialState,reducers:{resetSuffix:function resetSuffix(state){return initialState;},setSearchText:function setSearchText(state,action){state.pageNumber=1;state.searchText=action.payload;},setPageNumber:function setPageNumber(state,action){state.pageNumber=action.payload;},setPageSize:function setPageSize(state,action){state.pageNumber=1;state.pageSize=action.payload;},setTeamIds:function setTeamIds(state,action){state.pageNumber=1;state.teamIds=action.payload;}}});var _playersFetchSuffixSl=playersFetchSuffixSlise.actions,resetSuffix=_playersFetchSuffixSl.resetSuffix,setSearchText=_playersFetchSuffixSl.setSearchText,setPageNumber=_playersFetchSuffixSl.setPageNumber,setPageSize=_playersFetchSuffixSl.setPageSize,setTeamIds=_playersFetchSuffixSl.setTeamIds;export{resetSuffix,setSearchText,setPageNumber,setPageSize,setTeamIds};export var selectPlayersFetchSuffix=function selectPlayersFetchSuffix(state){return state.playersFetchSuffix;};export var playersFetchSuffixReducer=playersFetchSuffixSlise.reducer;
